subject: FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF NIGERIA
body:
FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF NIGERIA
                                MINISTER BOARD OF EXTERNAL PAYMENT
                                    PLOT 6 SATELLITE BUILDING
                                    P.M.B 342 KUBUA DISTRICT
                                         ABUJA-NIGERIA
 
FROM: DR, CHRIS JAJA                                                3RD JAN, 2024
THE DIRECTOR, APPROVAL AND PAYMENT DEPT.
MINISTER BOARD OF EXTERNAL PAYMENT
ATTENTION: 
I RECEIVED YOUR MAIL. YOUR REQUEST FOR THE CANCELLATION OF YOUR FUNDS PAYMENT IS VERY WELL NOTED, AND THIS PAYMENT MINISTRY WILL ACT ACCORDINGLY.
YOURS SINCERELY
DR. CHRIS JAJA
DIRECTOR, APPROVAL AND PAYMENT DEPT. (MBEP).

subject: Re:   FEDERAL REPUBLIC OF NIGERIA
body:
Hello Dr. Chris Jaja,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response. I'm interested in learning more about the funds payment you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some additional details?

Best wishes,
Roland
